category.name: ProductView
category.category_description: Preferences affecting the behavior of Product views

preference.name: Vis_PV_HowTo_Configure_BOM
preference.preference_description: Indicates how the BOM Window is to be configured before a Product View is applied to it. This configuration is captured in the Product View with the use of the VisStructureContext object. This object records the Revision Rule, Variant Rules, Assembly Arrangements and Occurrence Effectivity. Valid values are "UseCurrent" or "UsePV".
